name: DiceChallenge
description:
My first Submission to GMTK Jam!!!

other 2 submissions:

https://itch.io/jam/gmtk-jam-2022/rate/1623104

https://itch.io/jam/gmtk-jam-2022/rate/1620588

In this game, you have to adjust the speed and rotation of a dice, in order to make it land on a specific number!

each roll, you have two options, one of them with more risk, but more points, and the other with fewer points, but also less risk.

Get the highest score you can!
